title: Story log
description: Each entry provides summary text describing a single day or period of time.

start_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of a single day or start of a time period.

start_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time in a single day or start of a time period.

end_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of the end of a time period.

end_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of the end of a time period.

location_id.description: location where related to day or time period.

person_id.description: tha person related to the single day or time period being described.

title.description: a title describing observations or events during a single day or time period.

text_summary.description: a narrative description of observations or events during a single day or time period.
